text: Edmond Bouchard (May 24, 1892 in Saint-Étienne-des-Grès, Quebec – July 18, 1955) was a Canadian professional ice hockey left winger who sometimes doubled as a defenceman. ==Other websites== * Category:1892 births Category:1955 deaths Category:Canadian ice hockey left wingers Category:Hamilton Tigers players Category:Ice hockey people from Quebec Category:Montreal Canadiens players Category:New York Americans players Category:Pittsburgh Pirates (NHL) players
title: Edmond Bouchard
